titles.title: Holy Spirit
There's nothing worth more, that will ever come close

properties.copyright: 2011 Capitol CMG Genesis (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing)Jesus Culture Music (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's nothing worth more, that will ever come close
No thing can compare, You're our living hope
Your Presence Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've tasted and seen, of the sweetest of loves
Where my heart becomes free, and my shame is und one
In Your Presence Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit You are welcome here
Come flood this place and fill the atmosphere
Your Glory God is what our hearts long for
To be overcome by Your Presence Lord

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Let us become more aware of Your Presence
Let us experience the Glory of Your Goodness
Let us be come more a ware of Your Presence
Let us exp erience the Glory of Your Goodness
